bill_title: authorize the Governor to exercise certain powers regarding environmental protection and to enlist operator support to conduct mine cleanups.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the Governor to exercise certain powers regarding environmental protection and to enlist operator support to conduct mine cleanups. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 33-15 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: In addition to any other authority granted under chapter 33-15, the Governor shall have the express authority to require any large-scale gold or silver mining operation to assist in the cleanup and reclamation of any large-scale gold or silver mining operation in the event the responsible operator fails to conduct any required cleanup or reclamation. Large-scale gold or silver mining operations assisting in such cleanup and reclamation activities shall be entitled to reimbursement for all reasonable costs associated with such activities. Any large-scale gold or silver mining operation assisting the state pursuant to this section shall be treated as a response action contractor and shall be indemnified by the state from all liability associated with any such activities conducted on behalf of the state with the exception of any liability arising as a result of any intentional tort or act of their own negligence. All activities conducted pursuant to this Act are exempt from the requirements of chapter 36-18 relating to professional engineers, architects, and land surveyors and chapter 5-18 relating to competitive bidding for public contracts.
